content: Hi folks - looking at how to refer the child health hub as an Organisation - do you have any good logical identifiers I can use ? HPI-O, ABN, PAI-O ? Want to just to reference by identifier.
so guess i am asking who is the custodian organisation for the hub
good question Brett..let me come back to you on that ..
cool - it is so I can make Consent.organization reference as per http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-childhealth/StructureDefinition-ncdhc-consent.html by identifier rather than a full resource
Hi @Brett Esler , we have changed the Consent model, you don't need to invoke the Consent API any more. It's now manged through a custom operation on Patient API..
I am looking at your build - think there is a fault in AU Base FHIRpath am discussing now with @Brian Postlethwaite
sorry wrong thread! now everyone knows it needs some work!
will the custom operation be in the IG?
yes.. I've published it in the Operation section of the IG.. however the IG generation is not working at all as I messaged you
will try and get a fix in shortly
